  • trnsysGUI.IdGenerator

Source code for trnsysGUI.IdGenerator

import uuid
from itertools import count



[docs]class IdGenerator(object):
    def __init__(self):
        self.ids = []
        self.trnsysIds = []
        self.connIds = []
        self.blockIds = []
        self.idCounter = count(1)
        self.trnsysIdCounter = count(1)
        self.connIdCounter = count(1)
        self.blockIdCounter = count(1)


[docs]    def getUUID(self):
        x = uuid.uuid1().int
        self.uuids.append(x)
        return x



[docs]    def getID(self):
        id = next(self.idCounter)
        self.ids.append(id)
        return id



[docs]    def getTrnsysID(self):
        id = next(self.trnsysIdCounter)
        self.trnsysIds.append(id)
        return id



[docs]    def getConnID(self):
        id = next(self.connIdCounter)
        self.connIds.append(id)
        return id



[docs]    def getBlockID(self):
        id = next(self.blockIdCounter)
        self.blockIds.append(id)
        return id



[docs]    def setBlockID(self, id):
        self.blockIdCounter = count(id)



[docs]    def setID(self, id):
        self.idCounter = count(id)



[docs]    def setConnID(self, id):
        self.connIdCounter = count(id)



[docs]    def setTrnsysID(self, id):
        self.trnsysIdCounter = count(id)



[docs]    def reset(self):
        self.ids = []
        self.trnsysIds = []
        self.connIds = []
        self.idCounter = count(1)
        self.trnsysIdCounter = count(1)
        self.connIdCounter = count(1)
        self.blockIdCounter = count(1)
